info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 10:13PM EDT until April 11 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Ohio...
Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Wells and Adams Counties.
Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Ohio...Michigan...
Eel River at North Manchester affecting Cass IN, Wabash, Kosciusko, Whitley and Miami Counties.
Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Putnam, Allen OH and Paulding Counties.
Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County.
Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Elkhart and Noble Counties.
Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting Cass MI, Berrien and St. Joseph Counties.
Maumee River at Napoleon affecting Henry County.
Maumee River near Defiance affecting Henry and Defiance Counties.
Maumee River at Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN and Paulding Counties.
Saint Joseph River Ohio below Montpelier affecting Williams County.
Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Defiance, De Kalb and Allen IN Counties.
Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties.
Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Defiance, Williams and Fulton OH Counties.
Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Berrien, St. Joseph and Elkhart Counties.
North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County.
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Indiana...
Yellow River at Plymouth affecting St. Joseph, Marshall and Starke Counties.
For the Wabash River...including Linn Grove, Bluffton IN, Wabash, Logansport...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Eel River...including North Manchester...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Auglaize River...including Fort Jennings, Defiance... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Blanchard River...including Ottawa...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Maumee River...including Fort Wayne, Defiance, Napoleon... Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Saint Joseph River Ohio...including Montpelier, Newville, St. Joe River Ft. Wayne...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Saint Marys River...including Decatur, St. Mary's River near Fort Wayne...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Tiffin River...including Stryker...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Elkhart River...including Goshen, Cosperville...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles.
* WHEN...From Friday afternoon to Friday, April 11.
* IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river as well as flooding of basements in Niles can be expected.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Thursday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 12.1 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday, April 10. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EDT /1015 PM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY, APRIL 11

area.areaDesc: St. Joseph, IN; Berrien, MI; Cass, MI
